title: Firefox Browser lags after recent update
content:
Ever since the last update to 85.0, firefox for Windows 10 has begun to lag where mouse, scroll or keyboard inputs are delayed. CPU and other resources via task manager are low and firefox task manager provides no insight to me either.

This only happens in firefox, all other programs work fine. I have tried disabling plugins with no change in results.

Anyone else experiencing this or have any suggestions?
creator: applephx
